title: Pistorius Trial Nears A Verdict
teaser: The murder trial of Olympian Oscar Pistorius is nearing its conclusion in South Africa. To hear more about the closing arguments, Audie Cornish speaks with BBC correspondent Milton Ngozi, who has been covering the trial in Pretoria.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
